Title: Enacts and implements the clean air and clean water environmental bond act of 2021
Summary: Enacts the clean air and clean water environmental bond act of 2021 (Part A); implements the clean air and clean water environmental bond act of 2021 (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the creation of state debt in the amount of three billion dollars, in relation to creating the clean air and clean water environmental bond act of 2021 for the purposes of environmental improvements that preserve, enhance, and restore New York's natural resources and reduce the impact of climate change; and providing for the submission to the people of a proposition or question therefor to be voted upon at the general election to be held in November 2021 (Part A); and to amend the envioronmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to the implementation of the clean air and clean water environmental bond act of 2021 (Part B)
